item.description:
Dear westborough Spirituality Meetup member,

How are you?

Last month we had a wonderful discussion. Thanks for Anya, Peter, Marci, Ron, Shang-sheng and Selina are sharing your experience and input. It was a great meeup.

Last month we discuss about how to create peaceful energy to the world. As an old saying: A thousand miles begins with one step. If we start sending out the peaceful energy to the world, this world will become much better. Thanks all of your's sharing that we can do a lot of things from a little friendly smile to helping others. If we can transform our mindset, than everything around us could be very different. I am the one starting the peaceful energy and I am also the one stopping the vicious cycle. Even it is a tinny thing, but it may makes a huge different.

This month, we are going to share and discuss more about what we can do for this world. How can we make this world more peaceful and how can I do in my daily life to change. Butterfly effect, every small step counts.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and letâ€™s create positive energy to the whole world. Hope see you all in our meetup


About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the 2nd building on your right hand side when you drive into condos.You can park any place. call me if you can not find it 6172237166
item.name: Westborough Spiritual May Meetup
